level.heading: Voluntary dissolution before commencement of activity.
level.text: A majority of the organizers or initial directors of a limited cooperative association that has not yet begun business activity or the conduct of its affairs may dissolve the association.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 29-1012.02 and § 29-1012.05.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 1204 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
